ca.concordia.lanterns.services

Interface PlayerService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActivePlayerService

    public interface PlayerService
    A set of services available to the players. An implementation of this interface must be based on the agreed rules of the game.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    parth

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void exchangeLanternCard(Game game, int id, Colour giveCard, Colour receiveCard)
      Exchanges one Lantern Card from the Player stock of Lantern cards with one Lantern card from the Game stock of Lantern cards according to the rules of the game.
      void makeDedication(Game game, int id, DedicationType dedicationType, Colour[] colours)
      A Player dedicates/returns a set of Lantern Cards from its stock to the Game and obtains a DedicationToken.
      void placeLakeTile(Game game, int id, int playerTileIndex, java.lang.String lakeTileId, int lakeTileSideIndex, int playerTileSideIndex)
      A Player places a LakeTile into the Lake of the Game.

    • Method Detail

      • exchangeLanternCard

        void exchangeLanternCard(Game game,
                         int id,
                         Colour giveCard,
                         Colour receiveCard)
                  throws GameRuleViolationException
        Exchanges one Lantern Card from the Player stock of Lantern cards with one Lantern card from the Game stock of Lantern cards according to the rules of the game.
        Parameters:
        game - - the Game in the context of which the service is demanded
        id - - the id of the player who wish to make an exchange
        giveCard - - the Colour of the lantern card that the player wish to return back to the game
        receiveCard - - the Colour of the lantern card that the player wish to obtain from the game
        Throws:
        GameRuleViolationException - - when the rule for exchanging lantern cards is violated.

      • makeDedication

        void makeDedication(Game game,
                    int id,
                    DedicationType dedicationType,
                    Colour[] colours)
             throws GameRuleViolationException
        A Player dedicates/returns a set of Lantern Cards from its stock to the Game and obtains a DedicationToken. The number on the Dedication Token indicates the amount of honor a player earns from the dedication.

        The set of Lantern Cards needed to be dedicated for a Dedication Token depends on the rules of the game.

        Parameters:
        game - - the Game which the player is playing.
        id - - the id of the player who wish to make a dedication
        dedicationType - - the DedicationType the describes the type of dedication the player wishes to make.
        colours - - indicates the Colour of the lantern cards involved in the dedication.
        Throws:
        GameRuleViolationException - - when the rule for making a dedication is violated.

      • placeLakeTile

        void placeLakeTile(Game game,
                   int id,
                   int playerTileIndex,
                   java.lang.String lakeTileId,
                   int lakeTileSideIndex,
                   int playerTileSideIndex)
            throws GameRuleViolationException
        A Player places a LakeTile into the Lake of the Game.

        All the players receives Lantern Cards depending on the rules of the game.

        Parameters:
        game - - the Game which contains the concerned Lake for putting the Lake Tile
        id - - the id of the player who places the Lake Tile
        playerTileIndex - - the index of the Lake Tile the player wishes to place from the list of Lake Tiles available to the player.
        lakeTileId - - the id of the Lake Tile adjacent to which the player wishes to place the new Tile. This id must be from the list of Lake Tile already in the lake.
        lakeTileSideIndex - - the index of the TileSide of Lake tile indexed by lakeTileIndex. The lake tile indexed by playerTileIndex will be placed adjacent to this Tile Side of Lake Tile.
        playerTileSideIndex - - the index of the TileSide of Lake tile indexed by playerTileIndex. The lake tile indexed by lakeTileIndex will be adjacent to this Tile Side of Lake Tile.
        Throws:
        GameRuleViolationException - - when the rule for placing a tile is violated.
